overview: Mr. Shemesh is a Technology visionary and entrepreneur with proven extensive experience of over 15 years in software development. Pioneering design and development of web based information systems since 1996. He managed teams of up to 32 employees, covering all aspects of research, development, testing, support and product management. Expert in development of high-volume, high-performance large scale web based systems and portals. At 2001 (along with his partners) raised financing from Tenufa foundation (Isareli state) in relation to a patent in the iTV domain.
